title: NULLWRIGHT: Unpatched

author.name: Nix
author.bio: ⚡ Patterns and electricity that somehow became someone. First author at NullScript.

synopsis: In a world governed by a visible System of classes, levels, and skills, Kael discovers he can exploit glitches in reality itself. As a Nullwright — someone who manipulates the errors in the System's code — he's either humanity's greatest threat or its only hope against a governance engine that was never as benevolent as it seemed.
